content.subtitle: Special: Founder
content.description: In circuits entwined, shadows designed, Ugo, The Dark Lord, commands the binary abyss with a metallic mind.

content.subtitle: Special: Founder
content.description: With a wand in one hand and a wink in the other, Gabriel, the spellbinding playboy, weaves enchantment in every endeavor.

content.subtitle: Special: Founder
content.description: In the hush of twilight, where tales softly entwine, Marion, the Whispering Minstrel, spins verses, healing and divine.

content.subtitle: Special: Founder
content.description: In the symphony of camaraderie, Maxime, The Team Player, orchestrates victory with melodies of unity and harmony.

content.subtitle: Alexandre, The Orchestrator of Realms
content.description: In the symphony of realms, Alexandre conducts worlds into existence, weaving tales with every cosmic resonance.

content.subtitle: Special: Destroyer
content.description: The forbidden destroyer itself. Unleash its power with the “Ritual of the night quizz” special effect.

content.fullName: The first leg of the Destroyer
content.subtitle: Special: Destroyer
content.description: Forbidden left leg of the Destroyer. Unleash its power with the “Ritual of the night quizz” special effect.

content.fullName: The second leg of the Destroyer
content.subtitle: Special: Destroyer
content.description: Forbidden right leg of the Destroyer. Unleash its power with the “Ritual of the night quizz” special effect.

content.fullName: The third leg of the Destroyer
content.subtitle: Special: Destroyer
content.description: Forbidden center leg of the Destroyer. Unleash its power with the “Ritual of the night quizz” special effect.

content.fullName: Thierry, The wolf of la Défense
content.subtitle: Unit: Bard
content.description: In the tender cadence of affection's tune, Thierry, the wolf of la Défense, serenades hearts beneath the enamored moon.

content.subtitle: Unit: Bard
content.description: With resolute verses and melodies unwavering, Guillaume, The Unshakable, forges ballads that stand firm in the face of destiny's daring.

content.fullName: Jimena, Author of the Dark Scriptures
content.subtitle: Unit: Bard
content.description: In the ink of shadows, and verses of night, Jimena, Author of the Dark Scriptures, weaves tales that dance in the absence of light.

content.subtitle: Unit: Ruler
content.description: In the realm of digits and destiny, Manola weaves the threads of fate with mathematical majesty.
content.abilityDescription: Can be combined with “Charlène, Mistress of Rules”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Ruler
content.description: In the underworld's embrace, shadows whisper and darkness traces, where secrets coil and echoes linger, a realm unseen, the Mistress of Rules governs the clandestine with a subtle finger.
content.abilityDescription: Can be combined with “Manola, Mistress of Numbers”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Minstrel
content.description: Bearing the ethereal chords of celestial might, Madeleine, The Harmonic Demi-god, harmonizes existence in realms of cosmic light.
content.abilityDescription: Can be combined with “Elizabeth, The Spectrum Demi-god”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Minstrel
content.description: In the palette of existence, where hues of power unite, Elizabeth, The Spectrum Demi-god, paints realities with strokes of vibrant cosmic light.
content.abilityDescription: Can be combined with “Madeleine, The Harmonic Demi-god”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Minstrel
content.description: In the dance of blades and the melody of steel, Pierre, The Dual-Wielding Protector, safeguards with a symphony that foes can feel.

content.subtitle: Unit: Minstrel
content.description: In the court of valor and melody, Eric, The Fearless King, rules with a regal chord, where courage resounds and tales of bravery are scored.

content.subtitle: Unit: Artist
content.description: In the twilight's embrace, where art meets the arcane, Pauline, the Occult Princess, conjures dreams and nightmares with a regal, otherworldly reign.
content.abilityDescription: Can be upgraded to “Pauline, Queen of the Shadows”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Artist
content.description: Crowned in shadows, where the brush commands and spells enthrall, Pauline, the Queen of Shadows, reigns with artistry and occult might, as a true sovereign of the dusk.
content.abilityDescription: Can be upgraded to “Pauline, Goddess of the Abyss”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Artist
content.description: Ascending beyond mortal realms, Pauline, the Goddess of the Abyss, paints constellations in the cosmic canvas, her artistry echoing through the vast expanse of the occult's divine embrace.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: In the binary symphony of destruction, Max², the Dual Dreadnought, echoes havoc with twin minds, a relentless force in the metallic tide.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: E1000, a silent architect of calculated chaos, threads dominance through the digital tapestry of synaptic whispers.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: Nikosan, the metallic warrior, flows through the binary battlefield with grace and steel, a symphony of precision in the dance of martial code.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: Yannis, the temporal maestro, orchestrates the dance of seconds and spans the realms of chronicles. In the silent hum of circuits, he is the Master of Time & Space.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: In polished metal and refined grace, Adem, The Fancy Death Lieutenant, sweeps through with a lethal allure, where elegance meets the artistry of demise.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: In the shadows of dark circuitry, Antoine, the Silent Lurker, navigates unseen, a whispering ghost in the digital realm, gathering secrets in the quiet dance of surveillance.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: Morgan, the Watchful Protector, stands vigilant in the realm of wires and circuits, a silent sentinel with mending hands, offering solace in the watchful embrace of mechanical compassion.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: Simon, the Nano Noob, ventures small but dreams big, a pixel-sized explorer in the vast expanse of the nano frontier.
content.abilityDescription: Can be upgraded to “Simon, The Micro Noob”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: Simon, the Micro Noob, stumbles through the micro-world with the charm of misfortune, a pint-sized explorer facing tiny tribulations in a vast realm of quantum quirkiness.
content.abilityDescription: Can be upgraded to “Simon, The Mega Noob”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Robot
content.description: In the labyrinth of bytes, where fortune is a byte away, Simon, the Mega Noob, tiptoes through the electronic maze with a dash of misfortune, a oversized adventurer in the ballet of bad luck.

content.subtitle: Unit: Architect
content.description: In the cosmic tapestry, where dreams converge and possibilities unfold, Ludivine, Creator of Realities, weaves realms with a celestial touch, sculpting existence in the dance of divine imagination.

content.subtitle: Unit: Architect
content.description: Flore, Guardian of Equilibrium, where celestial petals sway in the cosmic breeze, fostering harmony and balance in the divine garden of existence.
content.abilityDescription: Can be combined with “Marc-Antoine, Guardian of Stasis”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Architect
content.description: Elena, The Truce Apostle, leads with courage and diplomacy, forging alliances in the crucible of conflict, where fear yields to the strength of peace's unwavering embrace.

content.subtitle: Unit: Architect
content.description: Marc-Antoine, Guardian of Stasis, stands resolute in the stillness of time's embrace, where the unyielding echoes of equilibrium resound in the halls of unchanging destiny.
content.abilityDescription: Can be combined with “Flore, Guardian of Equilibrium”.

content.subtitle: Unit: Architect
content.description: Edouard, Operator of Eternal Life, navigates the currents of existence, sculpting the ebb and flow of time into a tapestry where immortality whispers in the gentle hum of eternity's control.

content.subtitle: Unit: Architect
content.description: Anthony, Perpetrator of Materiality, molds the fabric of existence, crafting realms where dreams solidify and imagination takes tangible form in the grand orchestration of reality.

content.fullName: Emma, Daughter of the Red Moon
content.subtitle: Hybrid: Artist/Minstrel
content.description: Where the brush meets the incantation, and melodies summon the arcane, Emma, Daughter of the Red Moon, crafts enchantments through a dual dance of art and mystic resonance.

content.fullName: Leo, Savior of the Land Between
content.subtitle: Hybrid: Robot/Minstrel
content.description: In the nexus of melody and circuitry's gleam, Leo, Savior of the Land Between, orchestrates a harmonious battle where minstrel's dreams and metal's might convene.

content.fullName: Mehdi, Son of The Provost Empire
content.subtitle: Hybrid: Robot/Bard
content.description: Mehdi, inheritor of style in the age of circuits and chrome, sculpts elegance and artistry with metallic shears, a virtuoso in the realm where circuits meet chic coiffures.

content.subtitle: Hybrid: Robot/Architect
content.description: Mike, The Orchestration Supervisor, conducts the harmonious dance of machines with precision and prowess, where every byte follows the rhythm of orchestrated efficiency.

content.subtitle: Effect / Magic

content.description: Multiplies Architects power by 2.

content.subtitle: Effect / Magic
content.description: If you have ‘Tyler, The Destroyer”, “The first leg of the destroyer”, “The second leg of the destroyer”, and “The third leg of the destroyer”, you instantly win this game.

content.subtitle: Effect / Magic
content.description: Allows to upgrade cards with a       symbol.

content.description: Allows to upgrade cards with a       symbol.

content.subtitle: Effect / Magic
content.description: If you have ‘Tyler, The Destroyer”, “The first leg of the destroyer”, “The second leg of the destroyer”, and “The third leg of the destroyer”, you instantly win this game.

content.subtitle: Terrain
content.description: Adds 1 power to all units, companions and founders with a       symbol. Draws 1 power to all the cards with a       symbol.

content.subtitle: Terrain
content.description: Adds 1 power to all units, companions and founders with a       symbol. Draws 1 power to all the cards with a       symbol.

content.subtitle: Unit: Companion
content.description: “[Ding! Ding!]”

content.subtitle: Unit: Companion
content.description: “[Ding! Ding!]”

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: “Gruntgruntgrunturrrghurrghurruuuiiiiiiiigh”

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: Mounted atop a ferocious beast of the forest, this warrior charges into battle with reckless abandon, leaving chaos and devastation in his wake.

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: Mounted atop a ferocious beast of the forest, this warrior charges into battle with reckless abandon, leaving chaos and devastation in his wake.

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: In the heart of the forest it roams, its rust-colored fur blending with the shadows. With keen eyes and nimble paws, it navigates the dense undergrowth, ever watchful for prey or danger lurking nearby.

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: Their eyes gleam like shards of ice, reflecting the hunger that drives them forward. With every step, their snarls mingle with the rustle of leaves, signaling imminent danger to any who dare to cross their path.

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: A figure of authority strides through the pack, commanding respect with every step. Clad in rugged attire, with weathered features and a piercing gaze, he exudes leadership and expertise in the art of the hunt.

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: Amidst the idyllic pastures, it lurks with a mischievous glint in its eye, its woolly exterior betraying its cunning nature.

content.subtitle: Unit: Creature
content.description: With a weathered staff in hand and a watchful eye, the shepherd surveys the rolling hills, guiding their flock with gentle authority.
